mapper.insert: INSERT INTO g_cart( cart_num, goods_num, order_quantity, mem_num, opt_num, reg_date) VALUES ( g_cart_seq.nextval, #{goods_num}, #{order_quantity}, #{mem_num}, #{opt_num}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select:
SELECT c.cart_num, g.goods_num, mem_num, order_quantity, g.goods_name, c.opt_num, o.goods_size, g.goods_dprice, o.goods_stock, g.goods_status, (c.order_quantity * g.goods_dprice) as sub_total, (c.order_quantity * g.goods_dprice * 0.02) as order_point FROM g_cart c JOIN goods g ON c.goods_num = g.goods_num JOIN goods_option o ON c.opt_num = o.opt_num WHERE c.mem_num=#{mem_num}
ORDER BY g.goods_num ASC
SELECT NVL(SUM(sub_total),0) FROM ( SELECT c.order_quantity * i.goods_price sub_total FROM g_cart c JOIN goods i ON c.goods_num = i.goods_num WHERE c.mem_num =#{mem_num} )
SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(order_point),0) FROM ( SELECT c.order_quantity * i.goods_price * 0.02 as order_point FROM g_cart c JOIN goods i ON c.goods_num = i.goods_num WHERE c.mem_num =#{mem_num})
